thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com | 104 of 3780
thread.title: cheryl

author: cheryl
title: cheryl
text: I inherited my joy of reading from my mother, thankfully she also passed her love of saving money. She first found, and then recommended Thrift Books. I was amazed at the amount of money saved, the extensive inventory available, and, can you believe free shipping! My order quickly arrived & I couldn't be more pleased. No surprises here, you have found a lifetime customer.
